name: Everything Changed
description:
A zombie virus has just broken out! And because of people's ignorance, this virus has gotten out of control. Parkour away from all different types of zombies in a completely changed world. Will you be able to run away? Or will you meet the fate of countless others?

This game was created for the My First Jame: Summer 2020 event.  This game is a platformer and the goal of it is to avoid different types of zombies. The theme of this Jam was "change". I thought, "What's more changed then our own daily lives right now?" So a virus-themed game came to mind!

I used this experience to learn and experiment with coding, specifically enemy AIs (patrolling enemies on platforms, enemies that chased and avoided you, etc.). With the certain circumstances in this world, I also tried to give this game a message: stay safe and wear your masks. Any feedback is appreciated.

CREDITS:

Game, character art, zombie art, and platform art made by me.

Title art by Snowy_Oshawott#7640

Background art by Standard Human #3414

Music by Chopy61#4413
